tileSize.tooltip: The width and height of tiles in the game

startingMap.tooltip: Map id to first load with the game

lerpAlpha.tooltip: Camera lerp alpha. 1 = stick to the player, 0.1 = ease into the player's position

followPlayer.tooltip: Should the camera follow the player. Recommended for large maps.

defaultFont.tooltip: Default font to use in the game. Format is XXpt FONT_NAME

timeToShowClickTexture.tooltip: Time (in seconds) to show the click texture

font.tooltip: Font to use for tooltips. Format is XXpt FONT_NAME

padding.tooltip: Dialog box padding around the edges

actorImageSize.tooltip: Size to reserve for the player avatar

playerActor.tooltip: Id of the player controlled actor

defaultTile.tooltip: Default tile ID to use for empty tiles in the grid

fillColor.tooltip: Colour to fill behind the map. If fillTile is set, this will not show

fillTile.tooltip: Tile to repeat around the map area
